scripts.local-test: rm -rf build/* && truffle compile &&  truffle migrate --network localhost --reset && truffle test --network localhost
scripts.ropsten-test: rm -rf build/* && truffle compile &&  truffle migrate --network ropsten --reset && truffle test --network ropsten
scripts.mainnet-test: rm -rf build/* && truffle compile &&  truffle migrate --network mainnet  --reset && truffle test --network mainnet
